title: The Shark in the Dark
description: Down at the bottom of the deep dark sea Something is stirring and it wants its tea... The shark in the dark is big, mean and greedy and he enjoys tormenting all the little fishes in the depths of the ocean. Until one day, a squid comes up with a cunning plan to unite the fish and teach the shark a lesson heâ€™ll remember forever. A tremendously funny rhyming story, with a biting twist!
author: Peter Bently
